jet_node_name.description: The name of the Jet Node ID

jet_node_path.description: The Jet Node Path for the requested node ID

amazon_node_id.description: For reference: the Amazon browse node ID from their browse tree

parent_id.description: The ID of the previous level node that this node is a child to

jet_level.description:
How deep the browse node is in the browse tree

			#Valid Values

			* 0 = Category
			* 1 = Jet Level 1
			* 2 = Jet Level 2

suggested_tax_code.description: The suggested tax code related to the Jet node
